txt.en:
'We are going to need weapons if we are to fight our way to freedom.

'The Orc-guards often carry them, and we have seen racks of weapons ready for battle out there in the mine... though, of course our overseers never allow us near them.

'You might be able to retrieve some for us, if you are careful, then we should be able to hide them away here in the cell until we are ready to make our escape.'
'Quickly, we must hide these away until it is time to make our escape.\n\n'It will not be too long before one of our overseers stumbles upon our plan so you had best be quick.'
The slaves of the Orcs will need weapons if they are to fight their way to freedom.
Orc-weapons can be found on the Orcs throughout the mines.\n\nEdhere asked you to collect weapons for the slaves held in the Orc-mines to use during their escape.
Bring the collected weapons to Edhere
Edhere is in the Orc-mines.\n\nYou should bring the weapons you collected to Edhere.
